mapper.select: select * from p10_subject where unified_identity=#{unifiedIdentity} and del_flag = 0
select * from p10_subject where subject_id=#{subjectId} and del_flag=0

select p10_subject.* from p10_subject WHERE del_flag = 0
AND `name` LIKE concat('%', #{query.name}, '%')
AND phone LIKE concat(#{query.phone}, '%')
AND unified_identity LIKE concat(#{query.unifiedIdentity}, '%')
AND nature_type = #{query.natureType}
SELECT * FROM p10_subject WHERE del_flag = 0 AND subject_id = #{subjectId}
SELECT * FROM p10_subject LEFT JOIN p10_address ON p10_subject.subject_id = p10_address.user_id AND p10_address.type = 1 WHERE p10_subject.del_flag = 0 AND p10_subject.subject_id = #{subjectId}

select p10_subject.* from p10_subject left join p10_institution_subject_re on p10_institution_subject_re.subject_id = p10_subject.subject_id where p10_subject.del_flag = 0 and p10_institution_subject_re.ins_id = #{insId} limit 1
select p10_subject.* from p10_subject_bank_loan_re left join p10_subject on p10_subject.subject_id=p10_subject_bank_loan_re.subject_id where p10_subject_bank_loan_re.bank_loan_id=#{bankLoanId}
select * from p10_subject where phone=#{phone} and del_flag = 0
select * from p10_subject where phone=#{phone} and unified_identity=#{unifiedIdentity} and del_flag = 0
